casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, petitioner,
v.
Jason Daniel SIMS. No. 17-766. Supreme Court of the United States Sept. 24, 2018.

Joint motion of respondents for divided argument denied. Motion of respondent *51Jason D. Sims for appointment of counsel granted, and Jeffrey L. Fisher, of Stanford, California, is appointed to serve as counsel for respondent Jason D. Sims in No. 17-766.
